SPDC Portal

This agreement (“Agreement”) applies as between you, the user of “SPDC Portal” (“Platform”) and School of Professional Development in Construction (SPDC), the owner of the Platform. Your agreement to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions is deemed to occur upon registering the Platform. If you do not agree to be bound by these terms and conditions, you should not continue to use the Platform.

I. Grant of Licence

The SPDC hereby grants to you a personal, limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable licence to use of the Platform exclusively by you and for your personal non-commercial use. This Agreement is effective until terminated. You may terminate this Agreement at any time by stopping using the Platform.

The SPDC may, at any time and without giving notice to you, make any change, correction and / or improvement to the Platform, stop providing this Platform or any feature of this Platform to you or to users generally, or impose usage limits for the Platform.

Please refer to CIC website on CIC Privacy Policy Statement http://www.cic.hk/eng/main/disclaimer/

II. Ownership of the Platform

Notwithstanding the grant to you of a license to use the Platform pursuant to this Agreement, the SPDC retains all right, title and interest (including intellectual property rights) on all text, graphic images, logos, icons, sound clips, video clips, data compilations, page layout, underlying code (including object and source codes), software and any other materials in and to the Platform. Any act of “mirroring” the Platform or the materials contained therein on any device and/or server without the prior written permission of SPDC, or modifying or reusing the text or graphics on the Platform is prohibited. The SPDC reserves all rights not expressly granted under this Agreement.

You will not, nor allow third parties to (i) make and distribute copies of the Platform (ii) attempt to copy, reproduce, alter, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, transfer, exchange or translate the Platform; or (iii) create derivative works of the Platform of any kind whatsoever.

III. Username and Password

You are required to create a user account to use the Platform, the user name and password will be decided on your own. You undertake to keep the password and the username as confidential information and will not disclose any of this information to any other person under any circumstances. You agree and acknowledge that any use of the Platform by any person whatsoever (whether authorized by you or not) with your password and username shall constitute and be deemed the use of the Platform by you. You shall be held solely and fully liable to the SPDC, your ownself and any other third parties for any loss and damages arising from your disclosure (whether intentionally or unintentionally) and any authorized and/or unauthorized use of your password and username.

IV. Online Course Enrollment

When a user account is created, you can enroll and pay the training courses through the Platform. Applicants meeting the entry requirements will be processed on a first-come, first served basis. Once the course application is confirmed, you are required to pay the course fee by the deadline as stipulated by SPDC, otherwise your enrollment will be withdrawn by the Platform automatically and no advance notice will be given. Course fee paid is non-transferable and non-refundable for any reason. Request for switching of class or course upon enrollment is not allowed.

The SPDC may use the information you provided for the purposes relating to the administration of the course application.

Please provide all information as required. The SPDC may not be able to process your course application with incomplete or insufficient information.

V. Applicable Laws

All matters relating to your access to, and use of, the Platform shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People’s Republic of China.

VI. Language

Not all information relating to the training courses is supplied in both English and Chinese. Some is provided in one language only.

In the event that there is any inconsistency between the English and Chinese versions of this Agreement, the English version shall prevail.
